statements: SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC, stock_level DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM inventory WHERE stock_level > 10;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory WHERE stock_level < restock_threshold;
SELECT MAX(stock_level) AS max_stock_level FROM inventory;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM inventory WHERE stock_level > 50;
SELECT product_name FROM inventory WHERE restock_threshold < stock_level ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE stock_level < restock_threshold AND restock_threshold > 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_level, restock_threshold FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%' ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT name, quantity, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, name, category, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE stock_level < 50 ORDER BY last_update ASC;
SELECT name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, category, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price < 500.00;
SELECT id, location, stock_level FROM inventory WHERE last_update >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY location, last_update DESC;
SELECT name, category, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 10 AND category IN ('Clothing', 'Accessories') ORDER BY category, price;
SELECT p.name, i.location, i.stock_level FROM products p INNER JOIN inventory i ON p.id = i.product_id WHERE i.stock_level < 50;
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 50
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers
SELECT product_name, product_category, stock_quantity FROM products ORDER BY product_category ASC, stock_quantity DESC
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'S%'
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity, restock_threshold FROM products WHERE stock_quantity < restock_threshold
SELECT * FROM restocking_history ORDER BY restock_date DESC, restock_quantity ASC
SELECT product_name, product_category, CASE WHEN stock_quantity > restock_threshold THEN 'Restock Needed' ELSE 'Sufficient Stock' END AS stock_status FROM products
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM products WHERE stock_level > 50;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_quantity >= 100 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT restock_id, product_id, restock_quantity FROM restocking WHERE restock_quantity < 50 ORDER BY restock_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM products WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT product_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, restock_quantity FROM products JOIN restocking ON products.product_id = restocking.product_id WHERE products.stock_level < 50 AND restock_quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, price FROM products
SELECT supplier_name, address, phone_number FROM suppliers
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity_ordered FROM orders
SELECT product_id, current_stock, min_stock, max_stock FROM stock_levels
SELECT product_name, price FROM products
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity_ordered FROM orders WHERE quantity_ordered > 100
SELECT * FROM stock_levels WHERE current_stock < min_stock OR current_stock > max_stock ORDER BY product_id ASC
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM products JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id
